TextEng: "Return to Cania and never come back..."
"I never want to see your face again."
"There won't be a next time..." <StartAction>[Kill him.]</Start>
"This world is mine!"
"There is no honor..." <StartAction>[Kill him.]</Start>
"Repent!"
"A curse on mine and off with yours!" <StartAction>[Kill him.]</Start>
Text: "내 저주를 받고 네 목을 내놔!" <StartAction>[그를 죽인다.]</Start>

TextEng: "I've come to replace you."
"I've come to join you."
"I've come to stop you."
"All you gave me was an empty husk. Prepare to die."
"Then replace me. Do your best!"
"Thra'axfyl the Ambitious, surrender Toril to me!"
"Surrender Cania to its original inhabitants, the Knowers!"
"Repent of your crimes! Become kind-hearted and good!"
Text: "네 죄를 회개해! 착하고 선한 자가 돼!"

TextEng: "Then fight me, you coward!"
"Then I apologize: You bring this death upon yourself."
"Thra'axfyl the Ambitious, subordinate yourself to me!"
"I'll open an inn and make you the chambermaid!"
"You will serve me as henchman for all my future adventures!"
Text: "앞으로 모든 모험에서 널 부하로 부릴 거야!"

TextEng: "I will rule the Hells of Baator and you will be my lackey!"
Text: "내가 베이아터의 지옥들을 지배하고 넌 내 하수인이 될 거야!"

TextEng: "Rule the Hells of Baator with me as equal partner!"
"You don't know the half of it! Fight me, you coward!"
"Then I intend to die trying..."
"Thra'axfyl the Ambitious, I command you to stop this carnage!"
"Fight me!"
"Serve me to the end of your days!"
"Return to Cania and remain there forever!"
"Become kind-hearted and good!"
"I command you to die!"
"Side with him, then. I knew you'd betray me eventually."
Text: "그럼 그 편에 서. 언젠간 날 배신할 줄 알았어."

TextEng: "Qeyifalia the Skyseeker, I command you to side with me!"
Text: "하늘을 찾는 케이팔리아, 내 편에 서라고 명령한다!"

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Intimidate]</Start> "Whose wrath would you rather face? His or mine!?"
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> "Ignore him, Nathyrra. You've left the Red Sisters behind you."
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> "무시해, 나시라. 넌 이미 붉은 자매단을 떠났잖아."

TextEng: "Then to the Hells with you, I'll kill you both!"
Text: "그럼 지옥에나 가, 둘 다 죽여버릴 거야!"

TextEng: "Va'ardalia the Twinsouled, I command you to side with me!"
Text: "쌍둥이 영혼의 바아르달리아, 내 편에 서라고 명령한다!"

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Intimidate]</Start> "I'm far more evil than he'll ever be, dear..."
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> "May I propose a double-cross?"
"Once a traitor, always a traitor, then..."
"Va'ardalia the Twinsouled, I command you to fight alongside me!"
Text: "쌍둥이 영혼의 바아르달리아, 내 곁에서 싸우라고 명령한다!"

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Intimidate]</Start> "I will make your death more painful than your life ever was!"
Text: <StartCheck>[위협]</Start> "살면서 겪은 고통 따윈 비교도 안 되게 죽여줄 거야!"

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> "He lies! Your faith is what you make of it, Aribeth."
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> "거짓말이야! 네 믿음은 네가 만드는 거야, 아리베스."

TextEng: "Why are you doing this?"
"Sorry, the Hells froze over."
"You can't even make your own decisions! You disgust me. Betray me, then."
Text: "자기 결정도 못 내리잖아! 꼴도 보기 싫어. 배신하든가."

TextEng: "Betray me if you will but I will miss you, Deekin."
Text: "배신하고 싶으면 해, 하지만 보고 싶을 거야, 디킨."

TextEng: "Ixthyria the Scalesinger, ignore Mephistopheles and remain with me!"
Text: "비늘의 노래꾼 익스시리아, 메피스토펠레스를 무시하고 내 곁에 있어라!"

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Intimidate]</Start> "I'll wring your neck if you betray me, Deekin!"
"That's it, Deekin! You're in for it now!"
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> "Don't listen to him, Deekin! We're a team, remember?"
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> "그 말 듣지 마, 디킨! 우리 한 팀이잖아, 기억나지?"

TextEng: "I never trusted you anyway. Betray me and die with Mephistopheles, then."
Text: "어차피 널 믿은 적 없어. 그래, 배신해서 메피스토펠레스랑 같이 죽어."

TextEng: "Oeskathine the Demonwrestler, I command you to stand at my side."
Text: "악마와 싸우는 자 외스카틴, 내 곁에 서라고 명령한다."

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Intimidate]</Start> "Betray me and I'll kill you, Valen, I swear it!"
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> "Don't listen to his lies, Valen! I need you at my side!"
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> "그의 거짓말에 속지 마, 발렌! 네가 내 곁에 필요해!"

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> "Isn't your love for me stronger than that, Valen?"
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> "날 향한 사랑이 그보다 강하지 않아, 발렌?"

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> "I love you, Valen. Please don't listen to him."
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> "사랑해, 발렌. 제발 그 말 듣지 마."

TextEng: "No! I won't accept this! Don't do it!"
Text: "안 돼! 이건 받아들일 수 없어! 그러지 마!"

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> "I love you, Nathyrra. You're not a Red Sister anymore."
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> "사랑해, 나시라. 넌 더 이상 붉은 자매단이 아니야."

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> "But I thought you loved me, Aribeth."
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> "I love you, Aribeth. That is not evil."
